name: Grow To Hell
description:
Grow to Hell is a side-scrolling tower defence-like game, go through portals to fight endless waves of enemies and steal their souls.  Give them to the guardian or smuggle them away into a unique plot of land where they can grow power-ups for you.

Controls:
Shift & A+D Movement 
Q+E for Attacks
Hold W for the build menu, A & D to change selection E to build the selected item.
